alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; South End Sierra Foothills; South End of the Lower Sierra; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 7:17PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tulare County through 745 PM PDT... At 716 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of East Porterville, or 10 miles northeast of Porterville, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, and heavy rain could lead to localized nuisance flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Porterville, Lindsay, Exeter, East Porterville, Lemon Cove, Lindcove and Springville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; South End Sierra Foothills; South End of the Lower Sierra; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley
